io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.render

Interface Renderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GL11Renderer, GL20Renderer, GL30Renderer, LWJGL2Renderer

    public interface Renderer
    An interface representing a renderer.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

      • renderEmbedded

        void renderEmbedded(Image img,
                    float x,
                    float y,
                    float w,
                    float h)
        Renders a texture.
        Parameters:
        img - The texture to render.
        x - The X position of the texture.
        y - The Y position of the texture.
        w - The width of the texture.
        h - The height of the texture.

      • renderFiltered

        void renderFiltered(Image img,
                    float x,
                    float y,
                    float w,
                    float h,
                    org.newdawn.slick.Color c)
        Renders a texture with a color filter.
        Parameters:
        img - The texture to render.
        x - The X position of the texture.
        y - The Y position of the texture.
        w - The width of the texture.
        h - The height of the texture.
        c - The color of the texture.

      • renderSheared

        default void renderSheared(Image img,
                           float x,
                           float y,
                           float w,
                           float h,
                           float hshear,
                           float vshear)
        Renders a texture sheared.
        Parameters:
        img - The texture to render.
        x - The X position of the texture.
        y - The Y position of the texture.
        w - The width of the texture.
        h - The height of the texture.
        hshear - The horizontal shear.
        vshear - The vertical shear.
